Title: Directs the superintendent of financial services to promulgate rules and regulations limiting the use of credit scores to determine automobile insurance premiums
Summary: Directs the superintendent of financial services to promulgate rules and regulations limiting the use of credit scores to determine automobile insurance premiums.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the superintendent of financial services to promulgate rules and regulations relating to excluding the use of "credit scores" in determining auto insurance premiums
